titleStmt.title: A sermon on the 5th of November, being the last which was preached by the reverend father in God, Bishop Brownrigg. Bishop of Exon.
titleStmt.author: Brownrig, Ralph 1592-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Roberr [sic] Crofts at the Crown in Chancery-lane under Serjants Inne,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb: 1659"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Crown in Chancery-lane under Serjants Inne
